response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and potential impact on your endeavors. Given its worth of $800,000 to you, I am extending this exclusive offer to purchase it directly from us at the same value. I believe this would be a mutually beneficial arrangement, ensuring you receive the highest quality product at its true market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
